content:
At night, during a massive combined attack, the Russians once again hit the energy sites of Ukraine.

About thisreportedIn Ukrenergo.

"Thermal and hydroelectric power plants were damaged in the central and western regions," the statement said.

Currently, emergency shutdowns have been used in Dnipropetrovsk, and graphs of hourly shutdowns are used in Kharkiv region.

On Friday night, the Russian military attacked Ukraine with winged rockets from Tu-95MC aircraft, as well as aerobalist missiles "Dying".

During the rocket attack, explosions in the Dnieper, Khmelnytskyi and Ivano-Frankivsk were erupted.

As reported by the Armyinform, the United States Ambassador Bridget Brinka againcalledTo strengthen assistance to Ukraine against the background of the next rocket attack of the Russian Federation.
title: At night, the Russians attacked thermal and hydroelectric power plants in several regions of Ukraine
description: This was reported in Ukrenergo. “Thermal and hydroelectric power plants were damaged in ...
author: Army Inform
